BULKY_PRODUCT_HOME_DELIVERY.pricing: Příplatek za balení křehkého zboží: +19 Kč (týká se produktů vyžadujících speciální balení, např. figurky Coolectibles)

PARCEL_SHOPS.locations_count: Zásilkovna: více než 10tis. výdejních míst. PPL: 6tis. výdejních míst.

IN_STORE_PICKUP.pricing: ZDARMA. Additional fees may apply: 'Poslání zboží na prodejnu' (shipping from warehouse to store) costs 29 Kč. 'Osobní vyzvednutí na prodejně' (reservation and packing from store stock) costs 19 Kč.

SUMMARY: RealGeek.cz provides several delivery options for Czechia. Home delivery is handled by PPL for 119 Kč. Parcel shop delivery is available through Zásilkovna and PPL for 85 Kč. In-store pickup at their Prague location is free, though some related services have small fees. NOTABLE FEATURES: A surcharge of +19 Kč applies to fragile items. The distinction between different in-store pickup fees (free pickup vs. 19/29 Kč for stock reservation/transfer) could be confusing. WEBSITE ASSESSMENT: The shipping information is presented in a simple table but is incomplete. It lacks essential details such as delivery timeframes, free shipping thresholds, express delivery options, and cash on delivery surcharges.
